website_summaries.verdict: Tiny portable speaker with a low price point that offers quite a bit more versatility in use cases than you'd expect.
pros: Offered in several different colors that all look great
Tiny speaker at 3.3" by 2.7" by 1.2", so it'll fit anywhere and is easy to carry
Connects to a mobile device over Bluetooth or through an auxiliary input port
Allows you to connect a strap for carrying it
Gives you a surprising level of volume, considering its small size
cons: Some people won't like the boxy design
Cannot daisy-chain more than one GO Portable speaker

customer_reviews.title: ... day and I wanted something that could be heard better in the noisy and acoustically challenged mail truck
customer_reviews.text: I am a mailman and have over 400 songs downloaded on my android phone which I play in my mail truck throughout my work day and I wanted something that could be heard better in the noisy and acoustically challenged mail truck. I chose the JBL GO after reading the reviews and the price was just high enough to qualify for free shipping. I am very satisfied with the sound and the size is perfect for the small area I have in the truck for my stuff. I keep it cranked to 11 all day and just alternate my charging cord between my phone and the JBL GO. Rock on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient size , great sound 😌💕
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to be a lot bigger but the sound quality sure does pack a punch for it being so small I’m absolutely in love with it 😍 . I’ve bought other cheap cute little speakers on amazon and they sound like garbage lol ... they were awful and sounded like I dropped the speaker in a bathtub there were sratchy and had a horrible echo. This JBL go is adorable I love the color and quality! I almost gave up on a little speakers lol but this one is great !
customer_reviews.author: KawaiiKokonut

customer_reviews.title: Then I bought this great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I owned 2 Bose Bluetooth speakers that failed. I was beginning to think it was me. Then I bought this great little speaker. just as much sound as the Bose, and for so much less money. It doesn't "drop off" out of Bluetooth, it simply opens right up when I open my phone. If you are thinking of wanting an external speaker but think this one is too inexpensive, think again. But it. And no, I don't own the JBL company.
customer_reviews.author: D. Henson

customer_reviews.title: Join the many thousands of satisfied JBL customers around the world.
customer_reviews.text: I knew I would likely be thrilled with this little guy when I went on You Tube and found dozens of reviews IN DIFFERENT LANGUAGES. This little powerhouse is loved the world over. When you see TENS OF THOUSANDS of "hits" on those reviews, and few disparaging comments, you know you've found a device with world-wide acclaim. Small form factor, relatively big sound. Good quality for a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware: Battery life not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound comes out of this little box. However, a fully charged battery lasts around and hour, not 5 hours as advertised. And I have tested this multiple times with my iPod hooked directly into it.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is the best you’re going to get for under a hundred. It sounds great for music and movies. I’m surprised how excessively clear the dialogue sounds in movies/tv and I can discern the lyrics to songs as well as my pair of aiaiai tma-1’s. There is as much bass as a speaker of this size can provide. Each frequency band is well balanced for the speaker because there is no clipping or distortion at max volume. If you put an overdriven input (too high volume) into the 3mm jack you will only hear minor distortion at high volume which will happen with even the most expensive speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: The high volume is good. I work in a huge kitchen and I ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery doesn't go that long as they said (up to 5h) It barely goes up to 1 hour without charging. The high volume is good. I work in a huge kitchen and I can listen perfect my music from any side of the room. If you're gonna use it always connected to the charger in a room, then buy it, but if you need it for outdoors, definitely don't buy this one. I haven't found a perfect one for outdoors, even Boss doesn't go that longer with the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: OMG I was surprised by how loud it actually gets; I love it and it's easy to pair!! I placed it on my shelf...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed on how loud this tiny speaker is while still holding its sound quality. JBL has always made great speaker components but I have to admit I was a bit skeptical because of how small and inexpensive it is. I was proven wrong. I did notice a little more punch and a tiny bit more bass when it is set on a table or desk. I am installing this speaker in an animated prop for a display. Perfect for my application.
customer_reviews.author: Mask Maker

customer_reviews.title: Defective. Won't charge. Won't pair. Light remains red.
customer_reviews.text: Very, very disappointed. I was so excited because I thought JBL was supposed to be a good brand as I had a few JBL speakers before. The one I have received is defective. After a recommended charge time, the light remains red and unable pair to any of my units. The photo shows the speaker should have a blue light just like my old JBL speaker but this one remains red even after 24 hours of charging. I bought a cheap $16 unknown brand and it works but this JBL is trash. I will be returning it. Exchange for something that works or refund the money because I'm not paying for trash.
customer_reviews.author: #FlawlessFace

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker. Paired immediately with my phone. Good sound. Exactly what I was needing for the office or even at home while cooking or taking a shower (not in the shower mind).
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: This thing bumps! I've tried about 5 other Bluetooth ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing bumps! I've tried about 5 other Bluetooth speakers and this is by far the most impressive. It very compact and will fit in most people's hands or pockets and will fill an average size room with sound.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip J.

customer_reviews.title: It sucks works about a minute or so
customer_reviews.text: It sucks it only works for about a minute or so.when it does work for that minute or so it is loud which I like.I'm pissed because I had already thrown away the packaging to even start a return process.i really wasted money buying this
customer_reviews.author: Momma bear

customer_reviews.title: A good value and a good speaker with good sound.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, and its size this is an excellent little speaker. Very durable oh, it has fallen to the ground often. The battery life is solid. I will often use it to watch Netflix or Amazon Prime movies and TV shows. Sound is far better than the built in phone speaker and it's far more comfortable than having to wear earbuds. I will often put on a rerun of Star Trek and watch as I doze off. After a. Of time, the device shuts itself off to save the battery. It pairs very easily with my Samsung phone.
customer_reviews.author: Yohann Tsiro

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely shockingly great sound quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I know this speaker had a great history of reviews. I had a no name BT speaker, was loud but never had shockingly good SQ. The first time I played this JBL, I simply had it in my hand (not good for a speaker acoustically, as opposed to placed on a solid surface). I swore profusely. In a good way. For the money, I cannot believe they can make something so small, inexpensive, and sounds so great! I have NOT checked the battery life. It is supposed to be 1.5 hours. I wish it would have more, but that isn't a con since they clearly list this.
customer_reviews.author: XJfan

customer_reviews.title: Small,dur
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this speaker constantly. The sound is really, really awesome. This is her second JBL speaker, she wore the one I bought her several years ago out. I immediately ordered her a new speaker and offered her one of my speakers while she waited for the new JBL. She said no, she was used to the superior quality of her JOB so she went without a speaker and went back to using her Beats headphones until her new JOB arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Lassiter

customer_reviews.title: 2 of 2 ordered had problems!
customer_reviews.text: Update: After less than two months, both of the 2 of these speakers is having problems. I had to return the first one because it would not charge and then the red charging light would not turn off. Now the second speaker is having trouble with the USB charging port being loose and the charge not lasting. Please send me a refund if you can!!! Original Review: The reason I am giving it 3 stars is that I purchased 2 of these at the same time and one did not work.
customer_reviews.author: SilverLight

customer_reviews.title: Update to review of 2/2019
customer_reviews.text: WOW. For the small size of this speaker, it is a little powerhouse! Could not believe the great sound! I use it in my office at work. Use it with Prime Music. When someone comes in my office, they are shocked at the itty bitty size! Can't lose on this one! Update 12/28/2019 - so I have had this for almost a year. I have it paired with my phone and my laptop. I have used it a bazillion times, yet every time, I am shocked at the great sound that comes out of this little 2.5 x 3" speaker!! BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: K. Starr

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you want!
customer_reviews.text: I use my iPad for a bedroom tv at night. I wanted an inexpensive speaker to complete the set up. The one I had originally got was some $20 amazon pick that was ok but barely louder than the iPad. I needed to upgrade because with the air conditioner on I needed something louder. This is amazing. It’s exactly what I needed. It’s the right price and clear sound that you always get from jbl. It’s loud enough to use in the bathroom if you’re in the shower. It’s be great for the back yard. It might just miss being loud enough for the beach. I’m sure there’s a lot of other great uses for it.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this little speaker! We have whole-house entertainment, but sometimes I want to listen to my own stuff. This is perfect for a one-man show or small group! Has great sound. Hooks up really easily. Waterproof. Small, but not too small. It's perfect. If you're looking for a personal, portable blue-tooth speaker, this is the one. Much cheaper than the big guys, but comparable sound in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JBL does it again
customer_reviews.text: Why not 5 stars? Well probably because as I type this I can hear my daughter's horrible pop music coming out of this speaker and drifting down the stairs from her room and infesting my ear canals with its torture.... Seriously though, this little speaker had made my daughter quite happy. It has sufficient volume but does lack in the bass department but what do you expect? If you want the bass upgrade to one of the higher end (and much higher price tag but well worth it) models. This works perfectly for the kiddo to enjoy her music on her phone without having ear buds jammed into her ear drums.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Talk Radio
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker for listening talk radio on my phone. I listen music on the JBL Xtreme 2 and on the Charge 3. I thought the GO would be good for News Radio while I get ready to work and any time I want to listen on the weekend talk radio while I work around the house, this little speaker would be good. I just received today and tested it. Very good very loud too. Excellent. I think good for music also but I got the Xtreme 2 and the Charge 3 for music listening.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel K.

customer_reviews.title: not the best but you can hear bass tones pretty well
customer_reviews.text: This guy was a cheap purchase. Has decent battery life if you start from 100% battery charge. Gets loud enough to play acoustic drums over. It has ok bass response, not the best but you can hear bass tones pretty well, better than your phone speakers for sure. hugely portable. can take it anywhere and use it. somewhat water proof too. I use this thing in the shower and it hasnt died yet. it gets misted and i wipe it of after im clean and done and its been solid thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Boss Haus

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and portability
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound quality for such a little speaker. Its plenty loud for my needs as well. I use this for work and take it home with me everyday so the ease of set up and ease of carrying make this perfect for me. I purchased a small case for this so its super easy to pack up and go. I prefer to plug my ipod in but it also easily conects to Bluetooth. Love my little speaker.
customer_reviews.author: D. Warren

customer_reviews.title: All I can say is wow !
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow ! Great little Bluetooth speaker and a lot of bang for the buck. Very loud (in a good way). Vocals sound clear, bass is not too much. It can not be compared to the Bose Bluetooth speaker but that's a totally different "animal". Heck but for around $20, you can not go wrong ! We used it for a Beach vacation and it can be heard clearly as it was mounted in our umbrella pocket
customer_reviews.author: Anisha OG

customer_reviews.title: The sound is pretty decent for a mini
customer_reviews.text: The recipient of this speaker loves it and constantly reminds me of how much he uses it. The sound is pretty decent for a mini, sounds better than my $20 oontz angle, but obviously not as good as the more expensive Jbl flip 2 I bought for another person for a gift. I can't comment on the battery life really aside from I think it has good life, he keeps his plugged in all the time when I see him using it.
customer_reviews.author: ness

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Arrived after a couple weeks from China. Doesn't turn off automatically if not in use. Doesn't hold a charge for more than a couple hours when it is actually in use. Volume isn't much either. Overall, a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Anders

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Verdict: Highly Recommended Can get quite loud and has decent bass for a little box. It feels good, connects fast, charges relatively fast, and lasts a while. Only con is the giant JBL on it. Other than that, great!
customer_reviews.author: Positivenote

customer_reviews.title: $20 - worth it just to have a small bluetooth laying around whenever needed...
customer_reviews.text: $20 - Wow, it really is pretty dang good for $20 thats for sure. Okay, let me just mention what this is good for. I workout with weights in my back yard and like to either listen to Bibe Studies or music, it is great for that. I also bring this to work in a SMATREE brand case that looks really cool like leather and use it on my desk. The sound is better quality seeing that it is a JBL. I listened to many different speakers in this price range and this just has fuller clearer and louder sound at the price. Yayyy, buy it and the $10 case from SMATREE.
customer_reviews.author: Jiminny Crick It

customer_reviews.title: Not your college JBL speaker
customer_reviews.text: Had a couple of good weeks with this, then started to lose pairing after a day of not using the speaker. It also lost clarity with continued static, ended up throwing it out.
customer_reviews.author: Raw

customer_reviews.title: I liked this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I liked this speaker, the sound was good for a small speaker, it looks nice. However, the battery didn't last long, and today it suddenly stopped working completely and wouldn't charge. Ultimately, I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ngoc Diep Tran

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good!
customer_reviews.text: This was a father's day gift. The sound is beautiful and it's sooo tiny and cute! I love jbl and this speaker was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Nichol

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: I own the JBL Flip and wanted a second speaker for my office. This little guy puts out great sound. It is very small. It paired with my iPhone effortlessly. The charging cord is only about 7 inches long, so basically useless. Plus it had no piece to insert into the outlet, just a cord. However, it requires a standard micro usb connection, and I have LOTS of those hanging around so I was able to make do.
customer_reviews.author: ReadOnLizzie

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well as I use it with a fire tablet, mac air book, my cell phone and with the 3.5 mm connection, I use it with my work laptop. So good I am going to get the newest model JBL go 2. Battery life is good (I've used it up to 3 hours) but usually connect it via USB to whatever laptop I am using. I really like the sound this thing produces. I also have a sony SRS Xb20 which has much deeper bass and volume but it doesn't put the jbl to shame.
customer_reviews.author: Dre' Day

customer_reviews.title: good for car, good for picnics
customer_reviews.text: My car has no integrated bluetooth speaker and my wife kept speaking on her telephone while driving and her phone's speaker is buzzing while speaking. I bought this for her and it helped a lot. And it is so easy to use. If you want to listen to music, then again just open it from your phone. It has a standard android charger socket. I am charging it with my car charger. Because the given charging cable is too short (about 30cm, havent measured.)
customer_reviews.author: Enes

customer_reviews.title: Tiny power speaker. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Much much smaller than I expected but it works as well as my JBL Flip 2. Connected immediately and music is currently streaming crystal clear. I will test how loud it can go when I get home later.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Morris

customer_reviews.title: this little speaker packs a punch!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of punch for a little speaker. We are very happy with it. For a 650-ft space, you can hear the music/ radio across the entire space at less than mid-way of the power of this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Skies

customer_reviews.title: Decent speaker, but not quite what I expected
customer_reviews.text: A lot of hype around this speaker, so I wanted to get one to see. It's not very substantial and it lacks the bass that some people are claiming it has. Now that I see how small it is, I'm not surprised though. For the price I'm not disappointed and I'm sure I will use it in a pinch but I think I will stick to the slightly larger speakers from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Newcome

customer_reviews.title: first one didn't work second one works great
customer_reviews.text: i got this, it come fast and for $22 the sound is a real JBl sound speaker, this is the second one i purchased, the fist one wouldn't connect, this one i charged it for about 15 minutes and was able to connect it right away. Will come back to this review to let you know in few months how is it working out
customer_reviews.author: N.A.C.E.

customer_reviews.title: This isn't an authentic JBL speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I checked JBL's site and this seems to fall under several parameters for being a fake. I purchased one from JBL and the sound quality is noticeably better than this one. I would not recommend buying this unless you don't care about having a fake JBL speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Adam M

customer_reviews.title: I love this little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker! I've been using JBL portable speakers for many years. I think they're the best value for the money and have very balanced sound considering the price point. Most affordable portable speakers sound tinny to me and have no bass. These are especially great for traveling. I just brought them to Europe with me for a month. They charge quickly and hardly take up any space in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Yogini

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for his birthday and he loves it! It's a nice portable size with great sound quality. He uses it when he is at soccer practice to blast his favorite music while he is training. For a small speaker, it packs a powerful punch. We have a larger JBL speaker that is amazing...that is what prompted me to buy JBL again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Luongo

customer_reviews.title: For quiet listening - go elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker packs a punch but if you're listening at low volume (like in a cubicle, or other quiet setting), it will just turn off after about 20 minutes. This is a known problem with these and there doesn't seem to be a fix. Sound quality is pretty mid and treble focused, if you're looking for more bass, spend a little more, and go with the Bose Soundlink.
customer_reviews.author: HillaryL

customer_reviews.title: The bomb
customer_reviews.text: I found out about these speakers when I was travelling and one of my friends had them. The fact that you can carry it in your pocket because of the size is amazing. it's so portable, it's quite loud for the size. Not the loudest but definitely enough. I love it. got one for me and one for my mom as a gift. for the price you won't find anything better. love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great, loud, bass sound for my bathroom speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from such a small speaker! I use it in the bathroom for when I shower. Sometimes I leave it on top of the toilet, other times I'll bring it in shower with me. While no where on the packaging claims it is "waterproof", I have splashed water all over it and it still sounds great as if it has come straight out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: E-Munnie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This looks great, it's light and easy to move around, resists falls without even scratching, and sounds good. It's not for large spaces or lovers or high volumes, but if you want to listen to music or podcasts happily and for hours via bluetooth without worrying about the battery, this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Membrillita

customer_reviews.title: Long last battery. Good quality sound
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I was skeptical about the reviews of the speaker not keeping charged long. I tried it out keeping it on from opening it and it lasted for the 5hrs. I charged it while it was off and I'm getting a lot of use out of it. It's great and it's in my fav color. I purchased it for a temp radio, my car radio went out and while I'm waiting on it to get fixed I listen to this in the car and it's good sound quality it's really wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little speaker. This speaker is small and lightweight. It can fit in any bag and goes impressively loud for its size. It is not waterproof. it is a pretty basic Bluetooth speaker. The auto shut down is a great feature to have. My last Bluetooth speaker had a power switch and would always end up dead from me forgetting to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I work in a kitchen and love to play my music while cooking. The sound and bass is amazing. Also the volume gets pretty loud. Such an awesome speaker for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Speaker With Decent Bass
customer_reviews.text: It's not the absolute best out there, but for the price, it's good enough for me. The bass is decent (which is very important to me) and the volume can be very loud! Wish it was smaller so I could fit it in my hip purse but it's still pretty small so would easily fit into a larger purse or backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Beach party hero!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a bumping speaker for your rap music, maybe not for you. If you want a pocket-size unit that will crank music for several hours at a vivid volume whole the party is happening, you can't do better than this. At our beach bonfire last summer it got knocked in the sand a few times and still works great. Great value for the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nice speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this speaker in my classroom so I didn't want to spend a lot of money. I find it easy to connect to. I replaced an older JBL with this one and both have had great sound quality. The battery runs out a bit sooner than I had expected but overall I'm quite happy with this purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Strawberry123

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: The sound of this JBL is exceptional for such a tiny speaker. It is head and shoulders above a similar sized speaker I received several months ago. It pairs flawlessly with my Samsung S9 and my Samsung Tab A. More volume that I expected.
customer_reviews.author: L. Van

customer_reviews.title: GO GO GO
customer_reviews.text: WOW. This Bluetooth speaker really works well. I have purchased other wireless speakers including a HP, but they are only effective within a limited distance from my MACBook. The JBL has a greater reception and better sound and is even somewhat effective through obstacles (walls). Competitive pricing. Good range of colors.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Small box but loud
customer_reviews.text: Love JBL products this portable speaker is loud for a little box. Price is good. Perfect for watching movies, videos or whatever your using it for. If you want something simple just to hear it a little louder than your regular speakers on whatever device this is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: My new love
customer_reviews.text: I am very fond of small gadgets. The sound quality is beyond belive. I was listening to it with my eyes shut and felt like I was near a big speaker. The highs and mids sound great, heard few things in the songs that were not very clear on headphones. Lows are a bit behind but this small speaker will amaze you.
customer_reviews.author: Syed Zeshan Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Affordable price & still a great quality JBL speaker
customer_reviews.text: Picture has pen for scale. The JBL Go is affordable, compact, & still maintains great sound + battery life. The Bluetooth connects right away for all devices that have Bluetooth technology. Any non-Bluetooth device needs 3.5 mm stereo jack male to male (sold separately). Microphone on the speaker was clear.
customer_reviews.author: TaGenuis

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker for my son for Christmas. It was a great price and I am very happy with the sound quality. It’s small size makes it portable and it can be brought into any room on the house or on the go. I have since misplaced my much larger Sound Kick speaker, and I now use this speaker more than my son does. I often use it in my car to listen to my Google Play songs, as I have an older model that does not have a Bluetooth stereo. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HBM

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, perfect size for an average sized apartment and travel. You can really turn up the volume with this speaker and it hooks up to your bluetooth pretty quick. You can't link multiple devices at once, but once you've paired, you can easily switch between devices just by holding the bluetooth logo for about 3-4 seconds. The price is super reasonable in my opinion for the quality you get and I've had JBL speakers, they don't last as long as Bose, but for the price, it's not a regretted purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Becca A

customer_reviews.title: Its cool just missing quality bass.
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this for a friend as a bday gift in the teal color. The speaker itself is cute and extremely portable. The sound is loud but I hate the fact that it doesn't have a bass button or some bass buildt in. I feel that loud isn't good enough. I look for that supreme sound from JBL and this is lacking that bass aspect. I gave it 4 stars because I feel it would still be better than any other small speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Nikki

customer_reviews.title: The best little speaker !
customer_reviews.text: Needed a little speaker that is transportable different places. Continue to be impressed with JBL quality. Great sound quality and battery life. Definitely my go to speaker for taking on vacations and out buildings around our yard. Not waterproof, but great for sitting in the lawn chairs on a nice day. Great price and quality!!
customer_reviews.author: PA Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Works great indoors ad out. Only issue is that you can only pair your phone to one if these speakers. I had bought my wife two for different rooms but I needed up with one for my phone. We both use them all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: seguinw

customer_reviews.title: Cool little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Still working fine after all the dust (lots of dust) from work and all the drops and abuse. I work construction so I can't buy something too expensive because it won't last but I don't want anything too cheap that I'm not going to be happy with but for this little speaker the price is right the sound quality is unbelievable it's not too loud to disturb people around me but just loud enough to hear over all construction noises.
customer_reviews.author: SeaJay

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker for audio books!
customer_reviews.text: Received August 28, 2017 and have been happy enough with the speaker that I ordered one for my husband as well. Let me qualify that we do NOT listen to music on this, only audio books and cannot speak to the "bass" or any other musically related issue. For audio books this is a great little speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Pretty impressive
customer_reviews.text: Super small size. Nice feel to it. The pairing to my phone was seamless and practically instantaneous. I have other wireless speakers that take their time pairing. Overall the sound quality it’s quite nice. It doesn’t have any significant bass but iI wasn’t expecting it to. It is pretty loud for the size and will work just fine for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: It’s a $25 speaker. I have expensive speakers this small but it was a white elephant gift. For what it is it’s nice. I would have kept it if I had received it. It is loud but not a lot of bass. But sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: ... those speakers it had punchy bass and it got pretty loud for it's size and the only one speaker ...
customer_reviews.text: I know JBL and their sound quality and this was one of those speakers it had punchy bass and it got pretty loud for it's size and the only one speaker in it. It had some nice highs. I like it even for the price. It was smaller than expected but I was pleased with it. I am an audiophile and I know what speakers sound good given that I have multiple types and different speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was a lot smaller than expected but it made for the perfect white elephant gift. It was definitely a favorite and most “stolen” lol. For the price, quality, and portability, it’s great! A video review of this device on YouTube helped me make the right decision.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not packed well but survived.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping box was a disaster. You could have put about 40 of these in the box it was in, and there was no packing material inside. Just the poor little speaker in a giant box. It survived unscathed. Nice little speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Alen Eckhardt

customer_reviews.title: Compact and lite quality sound in a room
customer_reviews.text: For it's size it does a great job. Fill a room with sound. I connect it to my electric guitar through a portable multi effects processor and it rocks. Not as loud and bassy as larger units but it does get close.
customer_reviews.author: dude

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: very nice! (especially because of the cost and size) Sounds wonderful. good bass. Only con is connecting to BT on my iPhone isn't nearly as seamless and pleasant as with my Powerbeats. I often have to go into settings to get it to connect. sound quality is like 4.2/5. compared to my powerbeats which feel like a 4.57/5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not very loud but userfriendly and portable
customer_reviews.text: i bought this speaker becsuse its small and portablr. it isnt much louder than the speaker on my actual cell phone so it doesnt really serve me for amplificatipn except for in very small spaces/short range. but i like how small it is
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Not only are all of my headphones JBL but this little speaker has been a must running groups going to the beach just an every day life sound is great the volume is perfect easy to use and battery life is exceptional
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker! Side note
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speaker! Side note, the volume controls the phone, no independent volume on the speaker. Makes the minimum a bit loud for a quiet office. I swapped it with another one I had at home and it's perfect there.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Good small speaker w bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Nice small speaker and great sound. I love JBL. Their speakers always sound great, it make your music sound good. In addition to wireless, nothing better, great for travel or garden hang out.
customer_reviews.author: 1Tea8uyer

customer_reviews.title: I bought it because of the great reviews. The speaker is loud but the audio ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because of the great reviews. The speaker is loud but the audio quality is poor and the weak bass. I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: slim23

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I use this speaker for my home office and my husband takes it in his golf bag when he plays. We both agree this is a great little speaker for the price. I use it to listen to the news or play Pandora on my desk. Sound quality is pretty darn good and plenty loud.
customer_reviews.author: A.Marie

customer_reviews.title: This item is awesome. Ive bought quite a few but this last ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is awesome. Ive bought quite a few but this last one worked one day and stopped for some reason idk. But Ive reordered another. I have a U2 Roll I payed $100 for and for a quarter of the price I think the quality and size of the JBL is superior. I recieved my first as a gift and I've used it every single day and it'll be a year February. It's so light. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J. Horban

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: You can pick these up pretty cheap right now. They are loud and clear for the money. The battery life could be better, and the newer version of these did pick up a couple of extra hours. JBL makes the best bluetooth speakers, as far as I'm concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: This should be $100!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing! It is so loud given the size. The quality is incredible too. I read reviews before purchasing and battery life seemed to be the only complaint. However, I played a round of golf and this lasted all 18 holes. 3+ hours of non stop music. If you’re looking for an inexpensive, high quality speaker, look no further!
customer_reviews.author: RM35

customer_reviews.title: Astonishingly good sound!
customer_reviews.text: I first got the JBL extreme for the home and was very impressed with quality. Since I travel a lot, I decided to keep with JBL and get this portable one. The sound is astonishingly good out of this. I'm usually a Bose person, but this little guy is super impressive! Battery lasted a solid 5 hours for me. I use this during travel with my laptop to watch movies and it's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Neil B

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an audiophile and he picked this to bring around with him outdoors. The battery lasts for at least 6 hours if not longer, and it sounds great for it's size!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The speaker was great! I could bring it with me everywhere and everyone loved it! The sound quality is absolutely amazing and very loud! I recommend buying this speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Higi

customer_reviews.title: My GF loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice portable speaker. Just the right size and volume level. And as you would expect with JBL, it has a large dynamic range, decent bass, and doesn't distort at higher volume. This was a gift and she really likes it. The color (pink) really looks nice. I'd recommend buying it. Nice little speaker. I may buy another one in yellow for me.
customer_reviews.author: wizardshat

customer_reviews.title: Small, loud and cute like the toddlers who enjoy it.
customer_reviews.text: Very small, portable, it’s loud for its size and the sound quality is great. I got it in blue and the color is very pretty. The battery lasts a long time, I use it for about 2 hours a day and charge it about twice a week. It connects immediately to my phone. Very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: R. Garcia Cox

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Not as loud as everyone saying it is. But it does well, may be a bit too high of a price for its lack of sound power. I travel for a living and it’s nice to have a portable JBL for hotel rooms. Battery life is a lot longer than I assumed! Decent product, wish it was $8-$10 less
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Durston

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker that does the job with adding sound volume to a phone. My daughter loves it. She chose black but there are some cool colors. It came highly recommended by her music teacher. Great price for this product.
customer_reviews.author: TannerFox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at an excellent price. I just purchased a second one for a friend. She’s hard of hearing and this helps boost the volume on her mobile phone
customer_reviews.author: Ixthyz

customer_reviews.title: But this thing is one of the best speakers for price and performance in amazon
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been working with sound equipment in land and at sea JBL is one of the top brands for quality speakers. I brought this thinking for $20 it’s just an average sound for the price . But this thing is one of the best speakers for price and performance in amazon . I take it everywhere. Good for in a room at the beach etc. not for parties or use as a sound system for a house etc. I’ve briught another 3 more for my family’s kids they all I’ve it.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound from a Small Player
customer_reviews.text: This little JBL is amazing. The sound is clear and there are low frequencies, even though they are soft. I enjoy using this in my bathroom so I can rock to Stone Sour while I shave. It can go anywhere and is great for podcasts. Very reasonably priced. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Why why why don’t they make quality things anymore
customer_reviews.text: So it’s been 3 months. It was working perfect. Great sound. Nice and compact. And now after not much use the sound is horrible. Im gonna contact amazon and also good thing I bought the insurance. Bummer cause I loved it
customer_reviews.author: tjm4

customer_reviews.title: very cute speaker
customer_reviews.text: It’s now a year later and I have to say the build quality is 5 star and the sound is great as well I would definitely recommend this, but it’s not very loud, if you want power you should consider something bigger maybe the jbl flip
customer_reviews.author: charles kohl

customer_reviews.title: What was I thinking?
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 13 year old. It puts out some serious sound... which I'm constantly having to ask him to turn down. What was I thinking?
customer_reviews.author: Sunset Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Bass and portability
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the sounds and the lightweight of the speaker. For the price its the best option for work for me. I have it at my desk and the volume isn't close to half way. The battery life IS NOT 5 hours but I keep it plugged in and it works great. Worth the price when compared to other $25 speakers out there for sale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and holds up to life with a teenage boy
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present in Dec. 2018 for my teenage son. He uses it regularly indoors and out with a small mp3 player using an audio cable. Impressed at how it sounds and stands up to all the use. Works well with my Samsung through Bluetooth also.
customer_reviews.author: Chris_GRMI

customer_reviews.title: Big value small box
customer_reviews.text: great sound and is definantly worth the value....I have a charge 3 and flip 4 and i bought this for my gf but she loves it while she cleans and I would buy this for me just to have a small one for whatvever reason...definitely a big sound for how small it is
customer_reviews.author: cess

customer_reviews.title: just turn on plugged in
customer_reviews.text: The equipment arrived well without any apparent damage, but unfortunately when I turned it on, after charging its battery, it didn't work; that is, only turn on the speaker if it is plugged into the power outlet. I was looking forward to that speaker because it was my son's birthday present, unfortunately he could not have it since the product came failed.
customer_reviews.author: Carola Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, a few hrs battery life
customer_reviews.text: Great color and size. Nice sound. The battery life is only for a few hours at max volume but it is small. Not the best for entire days at the beach or camping but wonderful at home with a charger in reach :)
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Bang for the Buck!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny of what I paid. Doesn't have as much impact as the Flip or the Pulse, but come on this thing is tiny costs 1/4 as much and still sounds awesome. Great product! Even though it isn't manufactured directly by JBL, I knew I could trust if they put their name on a product it would perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love my jbl speaker. Looks nice. Pairs easy. Charges fast. Nice and loud. Would buy several more. Packing was perfect. Arrived quickly. Do wish charge would last a bit longer. Sounds wonderful. Would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: LaRae
